name: Vehicular Canslaughter
description:
Welcome, esteemed volunteer, aboard the Voluntarily Helpful Super Nice KEWL Cleaning Person (VHSNKCP) Watercraft™. Your service is greatly appreciated!

You may notice some trash lying around in the ocean. Try to remove as much as you can!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Shift: Descend

Space: Ascend

Click: Fire Missile

Enter/Return: Upgrade
